data.name: Shocker
data.description: Shocker uses his Tech sonic bursts to damage entire teams and strengthen his Sinister Six allies.

starItems.name: Shocker
starItems.description: Shocker uses his Tech sonic bursts to damage entire teams and strengthen his Sinister Six allies.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to the highest Damage <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to the highest Damage <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to the highest Damage <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to the highest Damage <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to the highest Damage <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to the highest Damage <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.

1.description:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

2.description:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally

3.description:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies

5.description:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>

6.description:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>80%</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies

7.description:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>80%</color>.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
1.nextUpgrade: Repeat attack with a random secondary target as the new primary

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

Repeat attack using a new primary target randomly chosen from the previous secondary targets.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing. If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all targets.

Repeat attack using a new primary target randomly chosen from the previous secondary targets.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing. If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all targets.

Repeat attack using a new primary target randomly chosen from the previous secondary targets.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing. If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all targets.

Repeat attack using a new primary target randomly chosen from the previous secondary targets.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing. If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for all targets.

Repeat attack using a new primary target randomly chosen from the previous secondary targets.
6.nextUpgrade: Repeat attack a third time with a new random secondary target as the new primary

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing. If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for all targets.

Repeat attack using a new primary target randomly chosen from the previous secondary targets.

Repeat attack a third time using a new primary target randomly chosen from the previous secondary targets.

1.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.
1.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> for a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> ally

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> for a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> ally.

Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> for a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> ally.

Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
